full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA BRGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA 'DI NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BA ZHES, AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOD PAR, SKYABS GNAS DAM PA ZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZIS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD DE DAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KKYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHAD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,'GRO BO THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,
